import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Purchase a Phone Number"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/phone_numbers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Purchase a number and add it to your project.

#### Permissions
The API token must include the following scopes: _Numbers_.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"number":{"type":"string","description":"The phone number in E164 format.","example":"+15558675309"}},"required":["number"]}]}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The unique identifier of the Phone Number on SignalWire. This can be used to find, update or delete the phone number programmatically.","format":"uuid"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"number":{"type":"string","description":"The phone number in E164 format.","example":"+15558675309"}},"required":["number"]},{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name given to the phone number. Helps to distinguish different phone numbers within your project.","example":"Jenny"},"call_handler":{"description":"What type of handler you want to run on inbound calls.\n","type":"string","enum":["relay_script","relay_context","relay_topic","relay_application","laml_webhooks","laml_application","dialogflow","relay_connector","relay_sip_endpoint","relay_verto_endpoint","video_room"],"example":"relay_context"},"call_receive_mode":{"type":"string","description":"How do you want to receive the incoming call. Possible values are: `voice` or `fax`. Default is `voice`.","example":"voice"},"call_request_url":{"type":"string","description":"The URL to make a request to when using the `laml_webhooks` call handler.","example":""},"call_request_method":{"type":"string","description":"The HTTP method to use when making a request to the `call_request_url`. Default is `POST`.","example":"POST"},"call_fallback_url":{"type":"string","description":"The fallback URL to make a request to when using the `laml_webhooks` call handler and the `call_request_url` fails.","example":""},"call_fallback_method":{"type":"string","description":"The HTTP method to use when making a request to the `call_fallback_url`. Possible values are: `POST` or `GET`. Default is `POST`.","example":"POST"},"call_status_callback_url":{"type":"string","description":"The URL to make status callbacks to when using the `laml_webhooks` call handler.","example":""},"call_status_callback_method":{"type":"string","description":"The HTTP method to use when making a request to the `call_status_callback_url`. Possible values are: `POST` or `GET`. Default is `POST`.","example":"POST"},"call_laml_application_id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the LaML Application to use when using the `laml_application` call handler.","example":null},"call_dialogflow_agent_id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the Dialogflow Agent to start when using the `dialogflow` call handler.","example":null},"call_relay_topic":{"type":"string","description":"A string representing the Relay topic to forward incoming calls to. This is only used (and required) when `call_handler` is set to `relay_topic`. Alias of `call_relay_application`. If both are sent, `call_relay_application` takes precedence.","example":"office"},"call_relay_topic_status_callback_url":{"type":"string","description":"A string representing a URL to send status change messages to. This is only used when `call_handler` is set to `relay_topic`.","example":"https://myapplication/handle_relay_callbacks"},"call_relay_context":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the Relay Context to send this call to when using the `relay_context` call handler. Alias of `message_relay_application`. If both are sent, `call_relay_application` takes precedence.","example":"my_relay_app"},"call_relay_context_status_callback_url":{"type":"string","description":"A string representing a URL to send status change messages to. Alias of `call_relay_context`. If both are sent, `call_relay_application` takes precedence.","example":"my_relay_app"},"call_relay_connector_id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the Relay Connector to send this call to when using the `relay_connector` call handler.","example":null},"call_sip_endpoint_id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the Relay SIP Endpoint to send this call to when using the `relay_sip_endpoint` call handler.","example":null},"call_verto_resource":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the Verto Relay Endpoint to send this call to when using the `relay_verto_endpoint` call handler.","example":""},"call_video_room_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The ID of the Video Room to send this call to when using the `video_room` call handler.","example":"fe4093d9-58c2-4931-b4b9-5679f82652c6"},"message_handler":{"type":"string","description":"What type of handler you want to run on inbound messages. Possible values are: `relay_context`, `relay_topic`,  `relay_application`, `laml_webhooks`, `laml_application`.","example":"relay_application"},"message_request_url":{"type":"string","description":"The URL to make a request to when using the `laml_webhooks` message handler.","example":""},"message_request_method":{"type":"string","description":"The HTTP method to use when making a request to the `message_request_url`. Possible values are: `POST` or `GET`. Alias of `message_relay_context`. If both are sent, `message_relay_application` takes precedence.","example":"my_relay_app"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"capabilities":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"A list of communication methods this phone number supports. Possible values are: `voice`, `fax`, `sms`, `mms`.","example":["voice","sms","mms","fax"]},"number_type":{"type":"string","description":"The type of number this is defined as. Possible values are: `toll-free` or `longcode`.","example":"toll-free"},"e911_address_id":{"type":"string","description":"A list of communication methods this phone number supports.","example":null},"created_at":{"type":"string","description":"The date the number was added to your project.","format":"date-time"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","description":"The date the number was last updated.","format":"date-time"},"next_billed_at":{"type":"string","description":"The next date the number will be billed for.","format":"date-time"}}}]}}}}}}
